page.title: 08B.P.NUTRITION, LOWER WINCHAM
page.content: B.P.Nutrition is a part of the international B.P. company. They make food additives for animal feed, which include vitamins, minerals,trace elements and medicines. The raw materials are cereals,fats,fish meals and vegetables. 60,000 tons of additives are produced each year and sales total Â£30,000,000 per annum. Most of the production is sold in the U.K. with only a small percentage for export. The Wincham factory is the largest and most up-to-date B.P. Nutrition operation in Europe and was opened in 1975. However, the original firm was founded over 60 years ago by the Leigh family as an animal feed mill. In the thirties a local farmer discovered the beneficial effects of mineral additives and asked the Leigh firm to produce them for him. The rest is history.
